title: Real Estate Management System
description: Comprehensive Odoo module for real estate management with property listings, customer management, and automated workflows. Features include property search, client tracking, and commission calculations.

title: Task Management Module
description: Advanced productivity module with task management, progress tracking, and team collaboration features. Includes priority settings, deadline management, and progress reporting.

title: Gym Management System
description: Complete gym management solution with membership tracking, class scheduling, trainer assignments, and payment processing. Streamlines gym operations and member experience.

title: Hospital Management System
description: Comprehensive hospital management module with patient records, appointment scheduling, billing workflows, and medical staff management. Ensures efficient healthcare operations.

title: E-Commerce Web Application
description: Modern e-commerce platform built with React and Node.js. Features include product catalog, shopping cart, user authentication, and payment integration.

title: Mobile Fitness App
description: Cross-platform mobile application for fitness tracking built with Flutter. Includes workout plans, progress tracking, and social features.
